column5: New to this forum. Hope this is the right place to ask these types of questions.  Looking to gather info for ( hopefully) an annual trip Looking to fish walleye in May / June, American plan, rent or tow our boats, Ontario or Quebec 6-8 hours from upstate NY.  Thanks in advance for any/ all info!
Fill in the form here:  https://getnorth.ca  and youll get a ton of info!!
Check out Gow-Bush-Kon Lodge  . great spring fishing for walleye ,small mouth bass, pike and Lake Trout. They do the full A/P complete with boats. Email gowbushkon.com for more information
